website_summaries.verdict: Designed with a comfortable handle, so you can use it for long periods of time without hand cramps.
pros: Tiny teeth in the comb will catch both the adult fleas and any eggs in the fur
Should work on all types of coats for dogs and cats
Works equally well to detangle the fur
Easy to use, thanks to a nicely designed handle
cons: Teeth in the comb may bend out of shape if they're put under stress

customer_reviews.title: Catches Them All
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats and don't like using insecticide medication on them. In South Florida, they are bound to pick up fleas here and there, and they do. I needed to replace my aging flea comb and decided on the Hartz Groomer's Best Grooming Tools. The ergonomics of this comb allow it to be both easier to manipulate and comb out fleas. Some would get away with the old comb and its wide teeth, but not with this one. It's more efficient and the cats love their grooming. For the price, it can't be beat. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: Recommend For Struggling Bun Parents
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST flea comb I've ever encountered. Picked the fleas off my little bun like no other. My bun was also a huge fan, he purred the whole time! Not super rough against his skin but still performed the job. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best of many!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a fair number of cats in the last twenty or so years and several of them have been flea magnets, but the current kitten tops them all! I already had a very highly rated flea comb that worked extremely well with the other cats, but not on this one. She has a very fine downy undercoat like I have never seen before. I would see a flea and it immediately went into the flea underground. I bought two more top rated combs without any better results. This one has been a miracle and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: More effective than flea meds
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and I love the non-slip handle. My cats love it. I wasn't sure they would like being brushed with it but they absolutely love it. It glides through their fur and gets the fleas and eggs easily. I have tried just about every flea med and none of them worked for my two cats but this little comb worked
customer_reviews.author: Tearshia

customer_reviews.title: Small, But Is Doable
customer_reviews.text: This comb is sturdy and strong enough to comb through my dog’s fur (Jack Russell and beagle mix). It does not pull on my dog’s fur and he actually enjoys being groomed. It gets all of the bugs, dirt and anything that gets stuck between a dog’s fur out. My only complaint about the comb is that I wish it was bigger since it’s much small than I had initially thought and had more teeth on it. Otherwise, this is a good comb for dogs, cats and other pet with fur.
customer_reviews.author: Poyo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good for small areas on bunny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flea comb for my house bunny. I got it so I can comb her little feet and face because the Fur Buster comb I bought is too big for her small areas. I like that the comb has rounded tips so it doesn’t scratch skin.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Helped with our dead flea problem
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is amazing! My cat unfortunately had fleas so we gave her revolution and all of them died however I could always find dead ones on her. So I bought this hoping it would help and man it took everything out! Plus I think this is the first brush she actually loves! Like me brushing her put her to sleep! 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Britney Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful if your cat has fleas.
customer_reviews.text: Totally effective in scooping up all fleas. As long as you have a bowl of soapy water to dump them into quick this will be a huge help! We were having serious flea problems with our cat regardless of giving her 4 flea medications in a matter of 1 month. This is what finally did the trick. Our cat is black and somewhat fluffy so we can’t always tell that she has fleas until we pull out the comb and start brushing under her collar. Still find the occasional flea but nothing like the 18 we first got off her with this comb.
customer_reviews.author: Henry McAlpin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for removing any shedding fur from both my cats. As well as the fleas we have most recently started having an issue with. This is the first time I’ve dealt with the fleas on them, and with this brush it really helped to find them in this hidden places. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Teeth of this comb will bend if the comb gets caught in the fur
customer_reviews.text: It works great to find fleas but if it gets caught in a tangle the teeth bend very easily. Once the teeth are bent it could scratch the skin. I think the teeth should hold up better. This comb would probably be best for short haired dogs or dogs who don't get tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff I Buy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for dogs and cats!
customer_reviews.text: Received this and decided to give it a try on my dogs and cat. Not only did they enjoy it, it worked beautifully for removing flea eggs and dead fleas. They get trapped in the comb, I remove them and dunk them in a cup of water so they drown. I highly recommend. UPDATE 4/27/2019 This works so well, I had to repurchase for family members with pets!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Cant Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Better than I thought it would be for the price. Worked perfectly removing fleas from my poor kitties. I recommend this flea comb to all cat lover's. Worked great for my long haired cat's as well as short haired cat's.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Quin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I not only use these on my cat. But my 2 short haired dogs. I check especially for ticks everyday, they not only attach to my dogs, but also had 2 on myself. So I am constantly making sure my dogs don't have any. They are nicely made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pam zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Good for a shedding bunny
customer_reviews.text: Bought to brush out the bunny. She's been shedding and needed to get the double coat or loose hair out. This worked great to pull those hairs off without hurting her or pulling out the connected hairs. The teeth of the comb were close enough to pull clumps out.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Too small for most dogs
customer_reviews.text: The flea comb is really, really small. The teeth are only 1/2-inch long, making it totally useless for my golden retriever. It's barely possible to get it through my black lab's short coat, and the outside-most comb bent the first time I tried to use it. This may be perfect for short-haired cats, but for dogs, it's a waste of money. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective, but did not last
customer_reviews.text: This flea comb was quite effective but I was disappointed how quickly two of the teeth bent, making it unusable. The comb I was replacing had lasted for years and I actually had to fix its handle and go back to using it after this one failed. Might be OK for a one-pet family with lighter use.
customer_reviews.author: Jane gurule

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This flea comb is excellent and affordable. I rescued a dog that ended up being covered in fleas and I needed all the help I could get. After his baths I would run the flea comb through and this picked up all the little critters. Great purchase for your pet!
customer_reviews.author: kaylaelizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good flea comb!
customer_reviews.text: This comb really picks up the fleas. I was able to get the vast majority of the fleas off my cats with this comb. Glides through their fur well. The teeth are sturdy and seems like the comb will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Furminator at a FRACTION OF THE COST!
customer_reviews.text: This simple little tool is as good 4 getting rid of undercoat for as the Furminator...at a fraction of the cost! Love it! Durable, easy 2 clean, inexpensive & it arrived super-fast, days ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: SportsNut!

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Works be prepared to clean comb with each swipe. I used container with alcohol and a tissue to clear comb. Be ready dome are alive. Been great help with my 2 cats and they like the combing .
customer_reviews.author: DianeTheobald

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been fighting fleas on my foster kittens - resistant to any of the flea meds my vet gave me. This comb has been great at physical removal and the infestation seems to be going away now.
customer_reviews.author: Yasoda Dei Conti

customer_reviews.title: Great for short haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: This works well on short haired puppies! a jar with soapy water and this comb can clear a puppy of fleas in a few minutes! Side note; Did not work on our long haired Australian Shepherd
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality a d Very Easy to Hold & Use. VERY HEAVY DUTY Not Like The Plastic Junk usually made for Flea Combs this is a AWESOME Comb Especially for the Cost wow. Thumbs Up & 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Jim Thuesen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and use
customer_reviews.text: I love this new flea comb. The handle makes it easy to hold onto and allows a better angle of usage. The cushioned handle is easy to grip and doesn’t slip out of your hand like those smaller ones can. Does a great job of getting the fleas out, too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this comb
customer_reviews.text: Easiest flea comb I’ve ever owned! Fleas are a problem even though all my cats are on flea treatment- I like to comb each of them daily to check for fleas and to get rid of any matting- this comb fits in my hand easily and does not pull at their hair-
customer_reviews.author: Maggie1960

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flea Comb
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick on my cat's very thick fur. Works really well seems almost impervious to any damage you could inflict on it. I suspect it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Falagrady

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comb for my cats. They hate baths, so I use a soapy water bowl next to me to dip the comb during combing to drown the fleas. Works great and my cats seem to enjoy the extra attention and being combed feels like I'm petting them. The comb handle is sturdy and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: k. stueck

customer_reviews.title: Great comb and value!
customer_reviews.text: This comb really works! My dog usually bites any comb that I use but not this one. He is a cotonese puppy and his fur is medium length. The grip and the size is great and it helps with sorting out pesky fur knots. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: agnes

customer_reviews.title: Really picks up fleas!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a similar comb from a different brand, but I would run it through my kitten’s hair several times and it still would not pick up the flea. This comb picked it up in one try! It’s a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Figen

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this when we had a flea problem. It worked well and seems sturdy. I was able to get off quite a few fleas with it. My cat did not seem to mind it.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwoAndMore

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months now. It works well and has held up through multiple uses and cleaning. I like the grip, it’s well sized and the rubber is nice to keep it from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Riis

customer_reviews.title: Flea Comb works
customer_reviews.text: I went to Petsmart to get a flea comb and the cheapest one they had was $20. I was like no way I'm paying that for a flea comb. So I actually ordered 2 of these because both my dogs and cats got infested this summer and I wanted one handy at all times. Inexpensive, sturdy, easy to clean and gets the fleas and flea dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Must have gadget
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works! Gets the fleas right out, wished I bought one a long time ago. My dog didn’t like it in the beginning, but I tried to be gentle and make it an enjoyable experience like getting petted, after that he didn’t mind or try to get out of my reach lol
customer_reviews.author: jammie smith

customer_reviews.title: Light weight tool for removing fleas without chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Flea removal tool is well suited for its job. The grip is soft and easy to handle. The metal comb has fine teeth for removing fleas from dog's fir.
customer_reviews.author: SelmaTeacher7 - Daniel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised and a great price. My wife keeps a cup of soapy water handy to place the fleas in. If you found this review helpful please click it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Best all natural way to get rid of fleas
customer_reviews.text: The best way to get rid of fleas that is all natural. Trapped fleas great. I comb and then stick in boiling water. That kills the fleas instantly. Comb held up great in the hot water, did not melt.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comb for Fleas/Ticks
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. Super fast shipping, great pricing. Am very happy with this purchase and so is my Fur Baby!
customer_reviews.author: LindsayOrca

customer_reviews.title: Short teeth on the comb
customer_reviews.text: Nice handle. The teeth on the comb are very short. I guess it is made for very short haired animals. I prefer long teeth for all types of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but comb part too small!
customer_reviews.text: Works good but would work better if actual teeth part of comb was about 1/2-3/4inch longer. That’s why 4 stars. Comb just a bit to small. Comb length 7 inches but actually teeth part of comb only 2.5 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new pup who, unlike my previous dog, LOVES to run in the forest preserves and trees. It has worked wonders on the 2 ticks we found! Really comfortable to use, too! Only complaint is my dog wants to try to chew it as a toy! But really, it’s great for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Picked out fleas, kept them trapped in the teeth of the comb. Dipped the comb in dawn as I was brushing, bathed the cats, worked better than the flea pills I bought to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy  for daily use
customer_reviews.text: This product is used daily on four animals - 1 dog and three cats. It is easy to use and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: WPD

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pets with shorter hair!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a must have for anyone with a dog or cat that sheds a lot, especially with those smaller hairs! Could not believe how many hairs our dog sheds.. it would be even nicer if it were more compact and could fit in my pocket more comfortably but still a nice smaller size!
customer_reviews.author: Kylen

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair cats
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair cats and these are perfect to keep them mat free. They all love being combed much better than being brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Cabinlife

customer_reviews.title: Traps fleas, also pulls on dog's fur
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are close enough together to trap fleas (and I assume their eggs, as well). Easy to use and clean. My dog's curls get caught, which makes the brushing experience uncomfortable. Hopefully we won't need this brush, soon!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a sucky need
customer_reviews.text: We sadly started fighting fleas which led me to this purchase. This comb is lightweight but works rear. I’ve used it on the family cat, and both dogs (lab and chihuahua). It glides really well and is easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Danniel

customer_reviews.title: This comb is easy to hold and very sturdy. It is an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy . This flea comb is well worth the price. I had already bought one at a local grocery store and somehow misplaced it. This is one of the better plea comes I have used in my years of owning pets.
customer_reviews.author: Sdduke15

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: It is great on my Maltese, they have baby fine hair Regular combs do not get all the knots out. This is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiapet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comb!!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting this comb because my cats got fleas. I googled what to do and read a comb was necessary. This comb is awesome. The amount of fleas it removes is outstanding. My only issue is the distance of the teeth on the comb. When I rechecked the cats after they were dry, the eggs were still present. 5 stars if that could ever be fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Aresha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: nice little comb
customer_reviews.text: great comb! got it for fleas but it arrived too late to use it for the fleas, but we use it regularly for our schnauzer wheaten terrier (23lb) shedding pup!
customer_reviews.author: mjg

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: does exactly as expected, found a flea on my cat and I didn't even know he had them! So far only one so I think it was a fluke 😅
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buy this-it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use-quick use to remove fleas as needed. Speed Los up the process and the cat is happier for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Get Rid of Your Pet's Fleas
customer_reviews.text: It worked great to help my cat get rid of fleas. Excellent instructions come with it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Greenacre

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comb. It works better than I expected. It is comfortable to hold, feels like good quality and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: VJP

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful i recommend! シ👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Not bad I recently found out my puppy has fleas so will be using this it's pretty helpful and makes it easier to remove the fleas! 😊♡
customer_reviews.author: Elisabel

customer_reviews.title: Need to have this if you have fleas
customer_reviews.text: This works so well. I can tell if flea medicine works or not by using this. Even when I thought all traces of fleas were gone, was still able to brush live fleas off my cat. Dip comb in warm water with Dawn dish soap to drown fleas as you are brushing off. I was able to determine if I needed to do a booster treatment of flea medicine by using this comb
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: My poor baby has fleas, I've bought him soap at a over priced pet store and forgot to get him a brush to help get rid of those unwanted blood sucking dead things. THE BRUSH IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Queen

customer_reviews.title: First one ever.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I did without it. It works and you can tell right away if your pet has fleas. My cats like the gentle brushing too.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Miller

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Bunnies
customer_reviews.text: Very good brush for our rabbit! She loves it and gets sleepy as I groom her! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johmayra Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive purchase
customer_reviews.text: We already had some brushes, but we were looking for a brush specifically to help with ticks and fleas. This one is a fine comb with a great fit in the hand. We were pleasantly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Best flea comb
customer_reviews.text: I love these flea combs and they work really well at getting the fleas . The only problem is the metal teeth come loose and bend . So I buy them two at a time . I use it on my cats and dog.
customer_reviews.author: karen griego

customer_reviews.title: Hertz flea comb
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. It does take the fleas off my cat. And she loves the scratching she gets with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Product As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Though not as "grip-able" as advertised. Good for removing grass burs from the cat! :)
customer_reviews.author: 54mm Napoleonics

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: The moment I began using this comb I was getting tons of flea ‘dirt’ and fleas! My cat will lick herself wherever she is most itchy so I would go to those spots and gets lots of fleas! I can comb her for maybe 10 until she gets fed up but I’ve already seen results! Her fur is looking a lot cleaner and she is not constantly licking and biting herself! This tiny comb is a saving grace!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy, mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap item, wish the comb would be slightly longer- the comb does not grab as much hair as the nicer comb i had earlier, its overall okay for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help get the sleep out of my dogs fur by her eyes. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great but Not for Fleas
customer_reviews.text: This comb is great for general combing and is ergonomic and sturdy but I bought it because I thought it would help to comb out fleas. The problem lies in the fact that the teeth are too far spaced out as opposed to a previous flea comb I've owned. The fleas end up being able to jump off this comb. I really wanted to love this but it's not as useful as I assumed as a flea comb.
customer_reviews.author: Incognitouhkt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Right
customer_reviews.text: This comb is exactly the right weight, teeth are spaced close but not so close you can't use it, easy to clean, easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Cradle cap helper
customer_reviews.text: I used it to get the cradle cap skin off my baby after applying coconut oil. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ingman

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, works great
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I used it for the first time today. Took 7 fleas off my dog that I could not see with my naked eye. Easy to hold and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for any cat with any hair! My cats love it and let me brush em for hours lol .. happy with my purchase and shipping and handling was great!
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: It's a deal
customer_reviews.text: Have been working the knots out of my Maine Coon with it. It has been sturdy enough to handle his tough fur. I wouldn't use it for an all-around brushing, but for getting out individual knots it is just the tool required.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harlen Rife

customer_reviews.title: Happy Flea-Free Pomeranian
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pomeranian who gets really bad fleas during hot weathers. This worked wonders for my fur baby. I gave him a bath with warm water, dawn dish soap mixed with a little vinegar (known to help kill fleas) and i combed out all the fleas that were on him. The comb made it easy to catch the fleas, even the baby fleas. He feels so much better after the bath and comb out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use. Catches flees very well
customer_reviews.text: It is a good a good comb, the handle is comfortable, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and good price!
customer_reviews.text: Just your basic old fashioned flea comb, but made well and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Happy G’ma

customer_reviews.title: Good comb
customer_reviews.text: Bought to comb the dried SLEEP from my dogs eyes. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: ber

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to get out eye boogies when I wash my pups. I love it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Collimac

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: easy to handle fair price and got it right away. very happy
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: This comb is highly effective.
customer_reviews.text: After using this amazing comb for a couple days on our cat Yoda, he has no more fleas! No chemicals just dedicated combing! I’d say that is a major win in our book!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.text: This is a great comb for the price. Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Cat likes, we like so all is happy and seems to work..
customer_reviews.author: C.F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a fine job of catching any buggers on our pets. Works better for our short haired dogs than our longer haired dog.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it, this brush works like a charm compared to other brush.
customer_reviews.author: Varmint

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We love this product. Gets every last one out.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Morano

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday! Our cat enjoys it and it catches the fleas and flea dirt!
customer_reviews.author: Wizle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good to use under chin. Got it for my cats acne.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Great at tackling fleas.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I need it to do, which is comfortably groom out fleas from my cats’ fur. Easy to clean, closely spaced pins. Very sturdy and easy fit in the hand. The only small drawback is that the cushy handle gets cat hairs stuck on it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good for removing knots
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I use it to get out my cats knots. My vet used a flea comb for his knots, they came out so easily with no problems so this product has been amazing for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nick V

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: My dog “Bug” comes right to me so I will comb her.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Flea Comb!
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle, the teeth and the effectiveness of this comb. Better than the other two I've purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great on my Bernese mountain dog
customer_reviews.text: Works just as intended. Easy to clean and the handle molds right to your hand. It makes cleaning her a breeze
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Flea free
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my kitten which when was given to me was full of fleas. With the help of this comb our kitten is now flea free.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use this to get the out of my pup's after soaking the area with a warm wet cotton ball, then the goo comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: This works SO well! I even used it when I gave my dog a bath! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AmberD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, eye buggers gone!
customer_reviews.text: Comb is easy to hold and to get rid of eye debris from my little guy’s eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Littledogchick

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My dog prefers this to any other grooming tool. And it does work whenever he gets a flea.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality comb for the kitties. They enjoy being combed. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic gets the job done not bad for 3 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great, one of the cat now loves getting his hair brushed.
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long hair pets
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect to get my Maltese detangled and get some flea debris out.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Alamuri

product_meta.title: Hartz Groomer's Best Grooming Tools
product_meta.description: Size:Cats and Dogs| Style:Flea CombTell pesky parasites to ‘bug off’ with the Hartz Groomer's Best Flea Comb. Appropriate for cats and dogs with all coat types, this fundamental grooming tool easily removes fleas, flea eggs and other debris from your pet. The stainless steel teeth are gentle on delicate skin and as an added bonus are helpful in detangling small mats of fur. Plus, the ergonomic design allows for maximum comfort and control that will have you and your furry friend enjoy grooming together.
feature_bullets: Tell pesky parasites to "bug off" with extra-fine teeth that remove adult fleas, flea eggs and other debris easily with every stroke
Specially designed to work for cats and dogs with all coat types
Doubles as a grooming tool to detangle mats around delicate areas
Ergonomically designed handle allows for maximum comfort and control
